name: Sealed Blaze Dragon, Kaankshati
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if you have a vanguard with "Bavsargra" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & discard a card from hand], search your deck or drop for up to one Arms card, reveal it and put it into your hand, and if you searched your deck, shuffle your deck.[ACT](RC)[1/turn]: [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put an Arms from (VC) into soul], draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Grasp with that hand, the thoughts that remain true no matter when.

name: Strike Equip Dragon, Stragallio
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if you have a vanguard with "Nirvana" in its card name, [COST][discard a card from hand], search your deck for up to one card with the [overDress] ability or up to one "Trickstar", reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.[AUTO]: When this card becomes an originalDress, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a "Trickstar" from your drop, and call it to (RC).
flavor: These guns fire with sheer spirit, so they never run out of bullets!

name: Dragontree Wretch, Draco Batical
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your (RC) without any Dragontree markers, and put a Dragontree marker.[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your opponent's rear-guard is retired during your main phase, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one grade 1 or less unit card from among them, call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck.
flavor: A fallen spawn of the Dragontree. The personification of faithless destruction.

name: Almajestar, Astroea=Unica
effect: [AUTO](VC):When a trigger unit is [Soul-Blast] for the cost of this unit's ability, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Soul-Blast 3], bind all [Critical] triggers [Soul-Blast] for this cost, and perform all of the following according to the number of [Critical] triggers in your bind zone:・One or more cards - Choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.・Two or more cards - This unit gets [Critical] +1 until end of that battle.・Three or more cards - This unit gets drive +1 until end of that battle.
flavor: Linkage Unicalite――engrave it; the star of fate.

name: Diabolos, "Viamance" Bruce
effect: [AUTO](VC):At the beginning of your battle phase, if all of your units have "Diabolos" in their card names, until the end of your opponent's next turn, you "Final Rush", and if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, you "Final Burst". ("Final Burst" is also "Final Rush")[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, if you are in "Final Burst", [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a column, [Stand] all of your rear-guards with "Diabolos" in their card names in that column, and they get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: I'll show you! The detonating roars of our full power!!

name: Dragontree Wretch, Demon Sheridder
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your (RC) without any Dragontree markers, and put a Dragontree marker.[ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], choose a grade 1 or less card from your soul, and call it to a (RC) in the same column as this unit.
flavor: A fallen spawn of the Dragontree. Communication is impossible; there is only rejection and negation.

name: Blue Deathster, "Skyrender" Avantgarda
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:If your soul has a "Blue Deathster, Sora Period", [COST][put a Strategy from order zone into soul], draw a card, and until end of turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000, and "[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if that attack hit a vanguard, or you persona rode this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from hand], [Stand] this unit, and it gets drive -1 until end of turn.".
flavor: The boy drives the blue reaper that rends the sky and rids all evil.

name: Operate Master, Freiheit
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if your order zone has a set order, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from hand], search your deck for up to one card with the same card name as your vanguard or up to one Product card, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. If you have a vanguard with "Welstra" in its card name, choose up to one Product card from your hand, and put it into the order zone.[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if you have a vanguard with "Welstra" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], choose a Product from your order zone, and operate it.
flavor: Freelance operators sure have a lot of work to do.

name: Dragontree Wretch, Lloyd Akzeriyuth
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your (RC) without any Dragontree markers, and put a Dragontree marker.[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When a set order you played from hand is put into the order zone, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one unit card with a grade less than or equal to your vanguard from among them, call it to a (RC) in the same column as this unit, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: A fallen spawn of the Dragontree. A cruel presenter of reality.

name: Brave On Sky-trimmer, Rondahlia
effect: [ACT](RC):If you have a vanguard with "Bastion" in its card name, [COST][put this unit into soul], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets "[CONT](VC):All of your grade 3 rear-guards get "Boost"." until end of turn.[ACT](Soul):[COST][Put this card into drop], choose one of your grade 3 rear-guards, and it gets "Boost" until end of turn.
flavor: No holding back; let's move on with all our might!

name: Knight of Plowing, Dolbraig
effect: [AUTO]Front Row (RC):When your vanguard is placed on (VC) by the [RevolDress] ability, choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a grade 3 or greater unit, [COST][Soul-Blast 1] card with "RevolForm" in its card name], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: The fighting techniques of the silver wolf, its very will, have been handed down from generation to generation.

name: Dragontree Wretch, Solda Saakab
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your (RC) without any Dragontree markers, and put a Dragontree marker.[AUTO]Back Row (RC)[1/turn]:When your rear-guard is placed in the front row of the same column as this unit, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw a card.
flavor: A fallen spawn of the Dragontree. Drown in greed and trample down the path of barbarity.

name: Lavien Lord, Granfia
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], all Plant tokens on your (RC) become plant gauges, call a Noblesserose token to your back row center (RC), and put all of your plant gauges on that unit.[AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, [COST][put one or more, up to a total of five, Noblesserose tokens or plant gauges into drop], choose one of your rear-guards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn for each card put into drop for this cost. If you put three or more cards into drop, [Stand] that unit.
flavor: My dearly beloved rose! Let us protect this beautiful earth together!

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Goildoat
effect: [AUTO]Drop:When your vanguard with "Magnolia" in its card name is placed during your ride phase, if your soul does not have a "Sylvan Horned Beast, Goildoat", [COST][put this card into soul], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO]Back Row (RC):When this unit attacks, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle. At the end of that battle, if this unit is in the center column, [COST][retire this unit], and draw a card.
flavor: When the king's mighty roar echoes in the valley, through the cliffs he comes.

name: Dragontree Wretch, Bist Aiyatvas
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your (RC) without any Dragontree markers, and put a Dragontree marker.[ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], choose a normal order from your drop, and put it into your hand.
flavor: A fallen spawn of the Dragontree. The hoof of desolation, with no hope for stability.

name: Dragontree of Ecliptic Decimation, Griphogila
effect: [CONT](VC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000 for each Dragontree marker on your (RC). If you have three or more Dragontree markers, this unit gets [Critical] +1.[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:When this unit attacks a vanguard, choose a face up Calamity card from your ride deck, and remove it. If you did not remove a card, choose a [Over] trigger from your ride deck, reveal it, activate all of its trigger effects and additional effects, remove it, and [Stand] all of your rear-guards on (RC) with a Dragontree marker.
flavor: The roots that encroach the earth go deep. Empowered by the brilliance, destruction thrives.

name: Hunting Gatling of Dust Storm, Firas
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Eugene" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from hand], search your deck for up to one grade 3 normal order without [Regalis Piece], reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your opponent's rear-guard is retired by your card's ability during your main phase, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], [Stand] this unit, and this unit gets "Boost" until end of turn.
flavor: Now then――shall we start this merry hunt?

name: Pierce Equip Dragon, Halbados
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if you have a vanguard with "Nirvana" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put a card with "Vairina" in its card name from drop on the bottom of the deck], look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one card from among them with "Vairina" in its card name, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. If you did not reveal a card, [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: Real wishes are those discovered from fumbling about.

name: Desolate Spark Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if you persona rode this turn, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, retire it, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle. Your opponent chooses three normal units from their drop, and binds them. ("If you persona rode" is active even if persona ride is activated outside of normal ride)
flavor: Charge to max and release. An intense flash of discontinuity.

name: Seal-break Dragon
effect: [ACT](RC):If your (VC) has an Arms, [COST][put this unit into soul], choose a "Sealed Blaze Sword, Prithivih" or "Sealed Blaze Gun, Chandra" from your (VC), and the cost of all original [AUTO] abilities of that card is reduced by [Counter-Blast 1] until end of turn.
flavor: Break the seal, and unleash the blaze vessel.

name: Kitz Peak Griffin
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Almajestar" in its card name, choose two trigger units from your drop, and put them into soul.[CONT](RC)/(GC):If your bind zone has a [Critical] trigger, this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Shield] +5000. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: Seeking the smile of its beloved master, its dark wings soar through the night skies.

name: Clean-sweep Dragon
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If you persona rode this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose up to a total of three of your or your opponent's rear-guards, and you and your opponent put the chosen rear-guards into your own souls. This unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn for each card chosen by this effect. ("If you persona rode" is active even if persona ride is activated outside of normal ride)
flavor: Close your eyes. And become a shining moment of the past.

name: Azul Wild Flame, Frenadio
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if you have a vanguard with "Baromagnes" in its card name, [COST][put another rear-guard into soul], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and put it into soul. If your opponent's rear-guard was not put into soul, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: I'll have you join us...... Until these flames are satisfied.

name: Diabolos Knuckler, Jamil
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If you are in "Final Burst", this unit gets [Power] +10000/[Shield] +5000. (Active on opponent's turn too)[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if your vanguard is "Diabolos, "Viamance" Bruce", [COST][Counter-Blast 1], [Soul-Charge 1], choose up to one grade 3 or less normal unit with "Diabolos" in its card name from your soul, and call it to an open (RC).
flavor: Ya look like ya'd croak good! Let's test it out with a punch!!

name: Eahalten Vogel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], search your deck or drop for up to one grade 3 set order, reveal it and put it into your hand, and if you searched your deck, shuffle your deck.[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your set order is put into the order zone, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: The key to success, lies in a well-thought-out strategy.

name: Enlightened Age Dragon
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If you persona rode this turn, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & discard a card from hand], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. Choose a set order from your drop, and put it into your hand. Choose a set order from your drop with a different card name from the card that was put into your hand by this effect, and put it into your hand. ("If you persona rode" is active even if persona ride is activated outside of normal ride)
flavor: Even if the wind of destruction blows, civilization will continue to progress.

name: Galactic B-Hero, Bold Salos
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand for the cost of the ability of a Base in your order zone, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], call this card to (RC), choose a card with "B-Hero" in its card name from your drop, and scout it to your Base. (Scouted cards are put face up into your order zone)[CONT](RC):During your turn, if your order zone has two or more Bases, this unit gets [Power] +10000.
flavor: Arise, B-Hero. With the mission in your heart, be gallant and strong.

name: Gravidia Claxton
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a vanguard with "Nordlinger" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from hand], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets "[CONT](VC):If no trigger units were put into your trigger zone this turn, this unit gets drive +1." until end of that battle. (If a trigger is revealed before the second drive check, a third drive check cannot be performed)
flavor: The power to reach out for your ideals, lies here.

name: Decisive Heavenly Axe, Delibere
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack or the attack it boosted hits a vanguard, look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to one card with "Bastion" in its card name from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. If you revealed a card, and this unit is in the back row, retire this unit.
flavor: One who stands at the summit. Who can truly understand that solitude?

name: Gloria Storm Dragon
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If you persona rode this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], your opponent puts all of their rear-guards in the same column as this unit on the bottom of their deck in any order, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. ("If you persona rode" is active even if persona ride is activated outside of normal ride)
flavor: Thou art incapable of standing ere me. Maketh haste and begone.

name: Resentments Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) by a card's ability, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], [Counter-Charge 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Understood. I'll slice open a way out.

name: Knight of Vanquish Bow, Sfilt
effect: [AUTO]Back Row Center (RC): When your vanguard is placed on (VC) by the [RevolDress] ability, [Stand] this unit, and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: I'll finish them off here. Without fail.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Winnsapooh
effect: [CONT]Deck/Hand:If you have a grade 2 or greater vanguard with "Sylvan Horned Beast" in its card name different from this card, this card gets grade -1.[CONT](RC):If your vanguard with "Magnolia" in its card name was placed this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000.
flavor: I will go anywhere for honey♪

name: Tide Line Dragon
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If you persona rode this turn, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your other units, and that unit and this unit get [Power] +10000 until end of turn. ("If you persona rode" is active even if persona ride is activated outside of normal ride)
flavor: The thick barrage becomes a waterfall, leading the battle to its end.

name: Ranran Orangerine
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), you may call a Plant token to (RC). (Plant tokens are grade 0/[Power] 5000/[Critical] 1 and have boost)[AUTO]Front Row (RC):At the beginning of your battle phase, if you have a vanguard with "Granfia" in its card name, you may call a Plant token to (RC).
flavor: Dazzling and bright, just like the sun!

name: Tear Knight, Erianthe
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If you have a vanguard with "Flagburg" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from hand], choose a grade 3 or less card from your drop, call it to (RC), and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Stand up! Defeat is unacceptable!

name: Green-scaled Flame Knight, Statol
effect: [CONT]Front Row (RC): If your vanguard was not attacked this turn, all of your rear-guards cannot be hit.
flavor: If you wish to bypass this flaming sword, prove your bravery!

name: Winged Dragon, Pursueptera
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose a unit boosted by this unit, and it gets "[AUTO](VC/RC):When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it." until end of turn.
flavor: The fighting instincts engraved in its soul will not mistake the enemy that should be shot.

name: Stealth Fiend, Temarihime
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if your vanguard's grade is less than your opponent's vanguard's grade, this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Hello. Won't you play with me?

name: Clad in Prayer
effect: Play this if you have a vanguard with "Nirvana" in its card name, and one or more units each in the [overDress] state and the XoverDress state!Choose one of your units in the [overDress] state, it gets "[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your vanguard attacks, [Stand] this unit." until end of turn, choose one of your units in the XoverDress state, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: The overlapping brilliance is the light of prayers. A miracle spun by a noble wish.

name: Self-aware Spring Source, Uaqua
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put into soul from (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and put this card into hand.
flavor: Float? Sink? It doesn't matter either way.

name: Steam Scara, Zargon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, choose a unit boosted by this unit, and it gets "[AUTO](VC/RC):When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, choose up to two cards from your drop, and put them into soul." until end of turn.
flavor: It's my treasured enchantment. Be sure not to waste it.

name: Direful Doll, Charmaine
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if your vanguard's grade is less than your opponent's vanguard's grade, this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Let me show you a one-night dream you'll never forget for the rest of your life.

name: Prison-luring Lamp
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 3]!Choose up to three cards with different grades from your drop, and put them into soul. If your soul has four or more cards with different grades, draw a card.
flavor: One…two…three…four... And you're the last one.

name: Lady Fencer of Quantum Regression
effect: [CONT](RC):If your order zone has two or more cards, this unit gets [Power] +5000. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: This is where I belong. I won't let any of you take it away from me.

name: One Who Pierces Transient Causality
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if your vanguard's grade is less than your opponent's vanguard's grade, this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: The black spear that bends causality, will save all comrades in trouble.

name: Assault Flight Carrier, Lubetzal
effect: (After a set order is played, put it into the order zone)[AUTO]:When this card is put into the order zone, if you have a vanguard with "Blitz" in its card name, draw a card, and [Soul-Charge 1].Operate - [AUTO]Order Zone:When this card is operated, if it is your main phase, look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one unit card from among them with grade less than or equal to your vanguard, call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck. If it is your battle phase, draw a card.
flavor: Take flight. Beyond the vast and distant skies, until the end.

name: Disruption Strategy: Killshroud
effect: (After a set order is played, put it into the order zone)[AUTO]:When this card is put into soul from the order zone, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, retire it, choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor:
The mission this time is to ambush and wipe out the base of a criminal organization.
Undercover units, disperse the special interference smokescreen after infiltration.
Hunt down every vermin lost in the deep darkness with your righteous blade.

name: Crystallize Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit intercepts, choose one of your back row rear-guards, and move it to (GC).
flavor: Let us be the foundation of the people's right to peaceful lives.

name: Magic of Auspicious Signs, Tataril
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is revealed during your drive check, you may call this card to an open (RC). If you do, this unit gets "Boost" until end of turn.
flavor: Bravo! Looks like you've pulled a nice card!

name: Affectionate Harp Angel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if your vanguard's grade is less than your opponent's vanguard's grade, this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: The exalted melody grants courage to stand and face difficulties.

name: Renowned Phalanx
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1] if you have five or more grade 2 or less rear-guards!Your opponent puts all of their front row rear-guards on the bottom of their deck in any order.
flavor: Onward! Push the front lines!

name: Farmin' Pumpkin
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If you have a vanguard with "Granfia" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and call a Plant token to (RC). If your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, call up to two tokens instead of one. (Plant tokens are grade 0/[Power] 5000/[Critical] 1 and have boost)
flavor: My lord~ It's a bountiful harvest this year too♪

name: Burrow Mushrooms
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Put this unit into soul], call up to two Plant tokens to (RC), if you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Granfia" in its card name, choose one of your rear-guards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. (Plant tokens are grade 0/[Power] 5000/[Critical] 1 and have boost)
flavor: Digging♪ Diving♪ T~reasure hunting♪

name: Narcissus Noble, Neeltje
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if your vanguard's grade is less than your opponent's vanguard's grade, this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: You've fallen for me, haven't you? I can tell from the look in your eyes♡

name: Prolific Oranges
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!Call up to two Plant tokens to (RC). (Plant tokens are grade 0/[Power] 5000/[Critical] 1 and have boost)
flavor: Lala~la~♪ Let's grow~ deli~cious fruits~♪

name: Stalwart Lance Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits a grade 3 or greater vanguard, choose two of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire them.
flavor: The veteran earth dragon slaughters many with its single thrust.

name: Saw Equip Dragon, Chainzown
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand during your turn, if you have a vanguard with "Nirvana" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], choose a card with "Vairina" in its card name from your drop, and put it into your hand.
flavor: I just…wanted to see what lies beyond this rift.

name: Sealed Blaze Dragon, Anugam
effect: [CONT]Drop: If you have a vanguard with "Bavsargra" in its card name, this card is regarded as grade 1.
flavor: The one who broke the seal on me…... Was it you?

name: Hopping Bullet of Dust Storm, Hanady
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from deck, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Tadah! Surprise! Ba-ba-ba-ba-bang~♪

name: Blaze Maiden, Addison
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if your opponent has three or less rear-guards, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle. If your opponent has one or less rear-guards, it gets [Power] +10000 instead of +5000.
flavor: A heated and intense, resplendent dance of prayers.

name: Mace Equip Dragon, Mazenalba
effect: [CONT](RC):During the battle this unit boosted a unit with originalDress, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: A blow that shocks right to the core.

name: Stealth Dragon, Raspear
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if your opponent's bind zone has a card, [Soul-Charge 1], and this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: We're betting our lives here. It's natural to get desperate.

name: Blaze Maiden, Madison
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts "Blaze Maiden, Addison", you may [Soul-Charge 2].
flavor: A pure and tranquil, sophisticated dance of prayers.

name: Diabolos Striker, Greg
effect: [AUTO]Front Row (RC):When you "Final Burst", [COST][Soul-Blast 2], [Counter-Charge 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: The explosive field is now a crucible of exhilaration and excitement.

name: Rollnick Cerberus
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If you have a vanguard with "Almajestar" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose two trigger units from your drop, put them into soul, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Beside the Almajestar sits the terrifying figure of the chimera.

name: Almajestar, Turan=Dyna
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a unit with "Astroea" in its card name, choose a "Almajestar, Schwart=Sparda" from your soul, and call that card and this card to (RC).[ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If you have a vanguard with "Almajestar" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose two trigger units from your drop, put them into soul, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Anyone who gets in our way, we'll tear them all to pieces!

name: Byurakan Manticore
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if your bind zone has two or more trigger units, this unit gets [Power] +10000.
flavor: The glittering starlight in the night sky evokes an impossible power.

name: Airam Capricornus
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, if you have a vanguard with "Almajestar" in its card name, choose up to one trigger unit from your hand or drop, and put it into soul. If you put a trigger unit from your hand, draw a card.
flavor: With this, we're one step closer to our dream.

name: Almajestar, Schwart=Sparda
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Almajestar, Turan=Dyna", [Soul-Charge 2], and if a [Critical] trigger was [Soul-Charge], draw a card.[ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][bind a trigger unit from soul], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: My blade is with you, m'lady. I am forever your servant.

name: Diabolos Girls, Trish
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If you are in "Final Rush", this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Shield] +5000. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: Both her offense and defense are top-notch. That's why she's a regular.

name: Almajestar, Pypis=Mulchie
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: As long as I'm with everyone~♪ My wings can take me anywhere♡

name: Gravidia Gaoguenie
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is put into soul from deck, if you have a vanguard with "Nordlinger" in its card name, you may call this card to a back row (RC).
flavor: I am drawn to a greater being. That is surely inevitable.

name: Blue Deathster, Sachsen Ausfuhl
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 2], choose a grade 2 Strategy card from your drop, and put it into your hand.
flavor: Understood. No sweat. Leave it to me.

name: Blue Deathster, "Heavenly Death Ray" Stelvane
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a grade 3 card with "Avantgarda" in its card name, if your soul has a "Blue Deathster, Sora Period", search your deck for up to one grade 2 Strategy card, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. If you did not reveal a card, you may call this card to (RC).
flavor: With the light of the merciful angel, return the man-eating demons to hell.

name: Blue Deathster, "Dark Verdict" Findanis
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Blue Deathster, "Heavenly Death Ray" Stelvane", if your soul has a "Blue Deathster, Sora Period", search your deck for up to one grade 1 Strategy card, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. If you did not reveal a card, you may call this card to (RC).
flavor: The dark and silent void will pass judgment and deliver justice.

name: Blue Deathster, Ruri Turning
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1 & discard a card from hand], choose a grade 1 Strategy card from your drop, and put it into your hand.
flavor: Don't worry. I'll make it all work out.

name: Blue Deathster, Sora Period
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: Mission, start――

name: Shock Strategy: Death Winds
effect: (After a set order is played, put it into the order zone)[AUTO]:When this card is put into soul from the order zone, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, choose one of your vanguards, and it gets "AUTO(VC):When this unit attacks, all of your front row units get [Power] +5000 until end of turn." until end of turn.
flavor:
Attention! We will now begin the military intervention!
Extermination units will assault the destination at supersonic speed.
Cast the blue wind of death, dispel the evil on the battlefield――!

name: Bomber Strategy: Dusting
effect: (After a set order is played, put it into the order zone)[AUTO]:When this card is put into soul from the order zone, choose one of your vanguards, until end of turn, it gets [Power] +10000, your opponent cannot intercept, and cannot play blitz orders.
flavor:
Something unknown is invading the residential facility.
Long-range artillery units, intercept immediately.
Don't let it through. Godspeed.

name: Divine Sister, Amaretti
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, all "Divine Sister, Cassatella" and "Divine Sister, Spumone" on your (RC) get [Power] +5000.
flavor: Sisters! Empty your barrels!

name: Destruction Dragon, Dirgeroar Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand during your turn, if you have a vanguard with "Youthberk" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and put it on the bottom of their deck.
flavor: Heaven and earth crossed the divide, and began walking down a whole new path.

name: Reverence Rush Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose a grade 2 or greater card from your drop, and put it on the top of your deck.
flavor: Disintegrating will not be permitted. Do what must be done.

name: Divine Sister, Cassatella
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to one "Divine Sister, Spumone" from among them, call it to a (RC) in the same column as this unit, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: Whee~♡ Today's game is free-for-all! Bang bang~♡

name: Cut-off Angel
effect: [CONT](GC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 2 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: Who needs arms that only do evil? Let's cut them right off.

name: Knight of Asepsis, Legeita
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at the top card of your deck, and this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn. (Return the top card of your deck to its original position after looking)
flavor: With visions in heart for a better tomorrow, the sword weighs nothing in his hand.

name: Knight of Heavenly Signs, Wefliese
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if you have a vanguard with "Bastion" in its card name, choose any number of your grade 3 or greater rear-guards, move them to (GC), and all of the moved units get [Shield] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: I'll protect it! My pride as a knight!

name: Divine Sister, Spumone
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts "Divine Sister, Cassatella", draw a card, choose a card from your hand, put it on the bottom of your deck, and this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: She wastes a lot of shots. Take proper aim!

name: Burst Peas
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & retire a Plant token], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Eat this! Buuuuurst!! Peaaaaas!!!

name: Burly Axe Beetle
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have "Bulky Saw Stag" on your (RC), this unit gets [Power] +10000.
flavor: Which one of us is stronger――?!

name: Bulky Saw Stag
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have "Burly Axe Beetle" on your (RC), this unit gets [Power] +10000.
flavor: ――Let's settle it once and for all!!

name: Genius Wise Wolf, Granfia
effect: [CONT](VC):If your (RC) has a Plant token, and your soul has a "Future Suzerain, Granfia", when you would ride a grade 3 card with "Granfia" in its card name from your ride deck, you can ride without discarding a card from hand.
flavor: Can one really become a worthy lord just by studying?

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Lesserai
effect: [CONT](RC):During the sixth battle or more of your turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000.
flavor: Sit back and relax~ Waiting for the right moment is the trick to catching fish.

name: Future Suzerain, Granfia
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Genius Wise Wolf, Granfia", you may call a Plant token to (RC). (Plant tokens are grade 0/[Power] 5000/[Critical] 1 and have boost)
flavor: Here we go! Follow me!

name: Mouldy Shooter
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If you have a vanguard with "Flagburg" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +2000/[Shield] +5000. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: Let all who stand in the way of our flagship be buried in these waters.

name: Kind Lordling, Granfia
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: In his heart sprouted a pure wish: let everyone be happy always.

name: Griphosid
effect: (You can have a total of five cards in your ride deck made up of this card, three Calamity cards and a [Over] trigger)[CONT](VC):This unit gets [Power] +2000 for each Calamity card with a different card name in your soul.[AUTO](VC):At the beginning of your main phase, choose a Calamity card from your ride deck, and put it into soul. [COST][Put three Calamity cards from soul that were in the ride deck into ride deck face up], search your hand or deck for up to one "Dragontree of Ecliptic Decimation, Griphogila", ride it as [Stand], and if you searched your deck, shuffle your deck. If you rode a card, choose two of your (RC), and put a Dragontree marker on each of them.
flavor: This is a seed. It feeds on stars, this seed of despair.

name: Looming Demise
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!Search your deck for up to one Calamity card, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: A lone seed seized the brightest star. Its name is――

name: Minacious Metamorphosis
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!Search your deck for up to one Calamity card, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: The seeds disperse. Filled with abundant power, seeking their next star.

name: The Start of the End
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!Search your deck for up to one Calamity card, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: Somewhere, a star perishes while sowing a seed of endings.

effect: [AUTO]:When this card is revealed during your drive check, you may call this card to an open (RC). If you do, this unit gets "Boost" until end of turn.

name: Affectionate Harp Angel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if your vanguard's grade is less than your opponent's vanguard's grade, this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle.

name: Renowned Phalanx
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1] if you have five or more grade 2 or less rear-guards!Your opponent puts all of their front row rear-guards on the bottom of their deck in any order.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Winnsapooh
effect: [CONT]Deck/Hand:If you have a grade 2 or greater vanguard with "Sylvan Horned Beast" in its card name different from this card, this card gets grade -1.[CONT](RC):If your vanguard with "Magnolia" in its card name was placed this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000.

name: Tide Line Dragon
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If you persona rode this turn, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your other units, and that unit and this unit get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Ranran Orangerine
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), you may call a Plant token to (RC).[AUTO]Front Row (RC):At the beginning of your battle phase, if you have a vanguard with "Granfia" in its card name, you may call a Plant token to (RC).

name: Tear Knight, Erianthe
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If you have a vanguard with "Flagburg" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from hand], choose a grade 3 or less card from your drop, call it to (RC), and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Farmin' Pumpkin
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If you have a vanguard with "Granfia" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and call a Plant token to (RC). If your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, call up to two tokens instead of one.

name: Burrow Mushrooms
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Put this unit into soul], call up to two Plant tokens to (RC), if you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Granfia" in its card name, choose one of your rear-guards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Narcissus Noble, Neeltje
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if your vanguard's grade is less than your opponent's vanguard's grade, this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle.

name: Prolific Oranges
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!Call up to two Plant tokens to (RC).

name: Stealth Dragon, Togachirashi
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand during your turn, you may put this card into your soul.
flavor: Aim and throw! Make full use of that wrist snap!

name: Diabolos Madonna, Meagan
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if you are in "Final Rush", this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Do you want to know why I am known as the battering ram?

name: Detonation Monster, Bobalmine
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, if your Order Zone has a Set Order, [COST][put this unit into your soul], and [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: Research on how to make good use of blast waves is ongoing.

name: Painkiller Angel
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & retire this unit], and draw a card.
flavor: There's no need to worry. It'll be over after a small prick.

name: Spurring Maiden, Ellenia
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 &[Soul-Blast 1], choose a grade 2 or less card from your drop, call it to (RC), and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: The nation where the land and sea become one. That is Stoicheia.

name: Trickmoon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on your back row center (RC) from drop, [Counter-Charge 1].[DressBoost] - [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, the boosted unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle for each card your "Sealed Blaze Maiden, Bavsargra" is Armed with.
flavor: The world can simply be destroyed. As long as you wish so.

name: Brainwash Swirler
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit is placed on (RC), [Soul-Charge 1].[AUTO](RC):When your card is put into your soul by [Soul-Charge], if your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. (+10000 if [Soul-Charge 2])
flavor: Look into my eyes. Yes...... That's a good boy.

name: Cardinal Draco, Masurea
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Retire a Shadow Army token], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn. If this ability was activated for the third time this turn, this unit gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn.
flavor: As many times as it takes, until the enemy breathes its last.

name: Heavenly Pike of Solicitation, Cornvoc
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Soul-Blast 1 & Rest] this unit], look at three cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one grade 3 or greater unit card with a different card name from this unit from among them, call it to (RC), and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
flavor: Overlooking the state of the battle, and sending out a suitable amount of firepower.

name: Blue Artillery Dragon, Inlet Pulse Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked a grade 3 or greater vanguard, if it was the first battle of this turn, and your vanguard is "Flagship Dragon, Flagburg Dragon", [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and [Stand] this unit.[AUTO](RC):At the end of your turn, if the total number of attacks this turn is four or more, [COST][put this unit into your soul], and draw a card.
flavor: Telegram received from the flagship. Commence extermination now!

name: Noblesserose
effect: (This represents a Noblesserose token, and cannot be put in a deck)[CONT](RC)This unit cannot be moved to other circles, and if you have a vanguard with "Granfia" in its card name, all of the following effects are active.・When you would place a Plant token on (RC), put it as this unit's plant gauge instead. (This effect is mandatory)・This unit gets [Power] +5000 for each of this unit's gauge.・When you would retire rear-guards as cost, if it can be paid by retiring Plant token rear-guards, it can also be paid by discarding plant gauges.

name: Plant
effect: (This represents a Plant token, and cannot be put in a deck)

name: Dragontree
effect: (This represents a Dragontree marker, and cannot be put in a deck)During your turn, if you have a vanguard with "Dragontree" or "Masques" in its card name, all of the units on this circle get [Power] +5000.
